QuestData.Title: Oculeth Ex Machina
QuestData.Description: I have a plan to feed Shal'Aran.$b$bNow that I am no longer starving for mana I have had time to study ley lines in new regions. I detected an eddy of mana in the ley lines of Azsuna. I have plenty of magic at my disposal, but we must visit the ley line in person in order to properly redirect the energy to Shal'Aran.$b$bOculeth has graciously offered to teleport us there, but I could use an assistant. Care to join me?
QuestData.AreaDescription: Speak with Oculeth and teleport to Azsuna.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Oculeth and teleport to Azsuna.
QuestData.RewardText: That was a little terrifying. Sometimes I am not entirely sure that Oculeth knows what he is doing.
